Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix obstacles disappearing in multiplayer sync

Remove overly aggressive spacing check from handleObstacleSync that was
incorrectly filtering out valid obstacles. The issue occurred when local
obstacle positions diverged from synced positions due to timing/latency,
causing the spacing comparison to fail and remove obstacles before players
could reach them.

The host already enforces proper spacing in generateObstacle\(\), so the
sync should trust the host''s complete snapshot.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
